name: lmhmlmod1
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, clmod))

stmt.origin: simplld(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))))
stmt.pretty: simplld(c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2), c1 ∈ LMod, c2 ∈ LMod, (c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧(Scalar ` c2)=(Scalar ` c1)))

stmt.origin: lmhmlem(c0, c1, c2, cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, clmod), wcel(c2, clmod)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wceq(cfv(csca, c2), cfv(csca, c1)))))

comment: A homomorphism of left modules has a left module as domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Jan-2015.)
